Add.description: Button to add an anime/manga to user list

Anime.description: General translation of anime for places like drop downs

Discord_rpc_browsing.description: Discord rich Presence text if on overview page

Emby_Authenticate.message: MAL-Sync needs an Emby API key to work. More infos $Link1$Here$Link2$

Error_Blocked.description: Error message when the user is blocked on a website
Error_Blocked.message: Your IP has been banned on $Page$, change your IP or wait for it to get unbanned. A temporary outage could also be a reason.

Manga.description: General translation of manga for places like drop downs

Package_Description.message: Integrates MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori into various sites, with auto episode tracking.

Remove.description: Button for removing entry from MAL...

Search.description: Button to open the site search links on mal, anilist ...

Synchronize.description: Button to Synchronize state with mal...

UI_Rules.description: Rules text for the correction UI

UI_Score_Not_Rated.description: Text if nothing is selected in the rating dropdown

UI_Status_All.description: Dropdown text to show all anime on the users list

anilistClass_authentication.description: The token has been obtained and saved
anilistClass_authentication.message: Token saved you can close this page now

bookmarksItem_ago.description: Text for time in the past

correction_DBRequest.description: Popup that shows up when the user corrects an anime and asks if this change should be sent to the dabase for correction

correction_NoMal.message: Select this if the Anime/Manga does not exist on $page$

correction_Offset_text.message: Input the episode offset, if an anime has 12 episodes, but uses the numbers 0-11 rather than 1-12, you simply type " +1 " in the episode offset.

correction_Search_text.message:
This field is for finding an anime, when you need to correct the "MyAnimeList URL" shown above.
To make a search, simply begin typing the name of an anime, and a list with results will automatically appear as you type.

correction_WrongUrl.message: Only change this URL if it points to the wrong anime page on MAL.

filler_filler_confirm.description: Question if the user wants to skip the filler
filler_filler_confirm.message: This episode has been marked as a filler on MyAnimeList, do you want to skip?

filler_recap_confirm.description: Question if the user wants to skip the recap
filler_recap_confirm.message: This episode has been marked as a recap on MyAnimeList, do you want to skip?

installPage_Description_paragraph1.message: Quicklinks, basically, are buttons that open up your streaming/reading site of choice - they will be located on every overview page for any anime/manga.

installPage_Description_paragraph2.message: For example, if you like to watch anime on Crunchyroll, then Crunchyroll’s quicklink will appear on every anime page. It’s a convenient way to access your favorite sites with just one click!

installPage_Howto.description: Header for how to use section

installPage_Howto_Anime_Description.description: When the sync is executed for anime
installPage_Howto_Anime_Description.message: The sync waits until 85% of the video is watched.

installPage_Howto_Description.message: The sync with the database only happens when you open an episode or chapter on any of the $Link1$supported pages$LinkEnd1$ — no worries, we definitely have your favorite website in the list!

installPage_Howto_Manga_Description.description: When the sync is executed for manga
installPage_Howto_Manga_Description.message: The sync happens on page load and for a few pages it waits until 80% of the chapter is read.

installPage_Howto_Notes.description: The synchronization settings can be changed later
installPage_Howto_Notes.message: Synchronization can be configured in the settings later - feel free to customize it your way!

installPage_Links.description: Header for the quicklinks section during the install
installPage_Links.message: Choose preferred quicklinks - your favorite sites one-click away

installPage_Login_Successful.description: Text after the user successfully authenticated
installPage_Login_Successful.message: Fantastic, $Username$! You're now authenticated and ready to go.

installPage_Mode.description: Header for the MAL-sync provider dropdown
installPage_Mode.message: Select which anime database you want to use

installPage_Start_Description.message: Let’s do a simple briefing to get you started - takes less than a minute!

installPage_Wrong.description: Header of the wrong section on the install page
installPage_Wrong.message: How to fix an incorrect detected anime or manga

installPage_Wrong_Description.description: Description of the wrong section on the install page
installPage_Wrong_Description.message: You can easily change the relation like shown in the GIF below. An episode offset can be set on that page too.

kitsuClass_authentication_Success.message: Token saved, you can close this page now.

kitsuClass_authentication_text.message:
To login with Kitsu, you need to enter your account's e-mail and password.
Your credentials are not stored on your computer or anywhere else.
They are directly sent to Kitsu. Only the returned access token is saved.

list_sorting_unread.description: Dropdown option to sort list by unread

minimalClass_Popup.message: Please allow pop-ups for this website

overview_synonyms.description: Text of a button that shows the alternative names for an entry

prediction_Last_anime.description: Text for last episode release time

prediction_Last_manga.description: Text for last chapter release time

prediction_complete.description: Header for the complete translation/airing section

prediction_incomplete.description: Text if an dub/sub wont be completed by the translation team. Discontinued translations

prediction_next.description: Short Form Text for next episode/episode estimation

prediction_ongoing.description: Header for the ongoing section in the translation/airing progress section

removed.description: Flash message that shows up after removing an anime/manga entry from user list

settings_AskBefore.description: Option to not show the 'completed' message during the episode
settings_AskBefore.message: Show 'completed' confirmation dialog at the start of the episode/chapter

settings_ForceEnglishTitles.description: Option to force the usage of English titles on MAL

settings_Interval_Default_Anime.description: Dropdown label for selecting the global progress anime source

settings_Interval_Default_Manga.description: Dropdown label for selecting the global progress manga source

settings_LocalSync.description: Option to activate the local storage fallback sync

settings_LocalSync_Export.description: Button to Export Local storage fallback data

settings_LocalSync_Help_After.description: Text in case of problems with the localSync import. This is the string after settings_LocalSync_Help_LinkText. Possible emtpy if language does not need it

settings_LocalSync_Help_Before.description: Text in case of problems with the localSync import. After this there is a link with the text of settings_LocalSync_Help_LinkText
settings_LocalSync_Help_Before.message: If you have problems please retry in

settings_LocalSync_Help_LinkText.description: Link text surronded by the strings settings_LocalSync_Help_Before and settings_LocalSync_Help_After

settings_LocalSync_Import.description: Button to import local storage fallback data

settings_LocalSync_Label.description: Label where the import/export buttons are to backup the local saved anime/manga

settings_Mangasync.description: Manga sync fallback in case the manga reader progress tracking does not work

settings_Mangasync_readerTracking.description: Option to track the reading progress of a manga and if 10-100% of the manga is read, set the chapter to read
settings_Mangasync_readerTracking.message: Sync manga after reading $mangaCompletionPercentage$% of the pages

settings_Mangasync_readerTracking_percen.description: Slider to control at what percentage a manga chapter is considered complete
settings_Mangasync_readerTracking_percen.message: Update chapter to read at percentage

settings_Notifications_Sticky.description: Requires interaction to dismiss; ignores system notification timeout

settings_ProgressCheck.description: Header for the progress section in the settings

settings_Shortcuts_Click.description: Shown if no shortcut is set for an option

settings_Shortcuts_Correction.description: Text for the correction ui shortcut

settings_Shortcuts_Next_Episode.description: Description for the next episode shortcut option

settings_Shortcuts_Skip_Backward.description: Description for the the opening skip shortcut

settings_Shortcuts_Skip_Forward.description: Description for the the opening skip shortcut

settings_Shortcuts_Sync.description: Text for the sync ui shortcut

settings_StreamingSite_custom.description: Header of the section where you can add your own custom search links

settings_StreamingSite_custom_url_anime.description: Form field title to enter the search url for anime

settings_StreamingSite_custom_url_manga.description: Form field title to enter the search url for manga

settings_StreamingSite_custom_url_name.description: Placeholder text the field that sets the custom url name

settings_StreamingSite_text.message: If disabled, the streaming site will no longer appear in an anime’s sidebar on MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl.

settings_Thumbnails_text.message: The option is for resizing the thumbnails on MyAnimeList eg. thumbnails for characters, people, recommendations, etc.

settings_UpdateCheck_Text.message: Checks for new episodes in the background.

settings_Userscriptmode_Text.message: Disables the content script. This makes it possible to have the extension and userscript enabled at the same time.

settings_Video_Resume.description: Auto resume video where you left off toggle

settings_anilist_update_ui.description: UI in the aniList sidebar to update episodes progress and the score

settings_anilist_update_ui_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the Update UI option
settings_anilist_update_ui_tooltip.message: Allows to quickly update your episode count, rating and status on AniList without having to open the popover.

settings_autoNextEp.description: Autoplays the next episode after the video ends

settings_clean_tags_button.description: Button that leads to the clean tag page. This page is used to remove malsync meta data from the userlist tag/notes section

settings_custom_domains_button.description: Button that leads to the custom domain configuration page

settings_custom_domains_disclaimer.description: Text on the custom domain configuration page
settings_custom_domains_disclaimer.message: This feature allows adding custom domains to existing sites for handling domain changes and self-hosted sources, but it cannot add new sites.

settings_custom_domains_missing_permissi.description: Section header for asking to allow missing domain permissions
Asking to allow missing domain permissions
settings_custom_domains_missing_permissi.message: Some page permissions are not yet granted

settings_custom_domains_permissions_not_.description: Text that is shown when the browser does not support adding new permissions
settings_custom_domains_permissions_not_.message: The browser or the current window don't support adding permissions, please retry it with the url https://malsync.moe/pwa or use the extension popup.

settings_custom_domains_wrong.description: Error text if the configuration is not correct

settings_custom_position_below.description: Position of the quicklinks below the information section

settings_filler_text.message: This will check if the episode is marked as a filler/recap on MyAnimeList

settings_highlightAllEp_Text.message: This option will highlight all watched chapters/episodes in the list you can find on some Anime/Manga sites

settings_listsync.description: Header of the section of List Sync settings

settings_listsync_background.description: Option to sync list once a day in the background

settings_listsync_finishdate.description: List Sync label to display the user's finish date for an entry on a specific provider

settings_listsync_itemcount.description: List Sync label to show the total number of items that need to be synced

settings_listsync_list.description: List Sync label the size of a list on a specific provider

settings_listsync_master.description: List Sync label to show which provider is considered as the primary provider

settings_listsync_missing.description: List Sync header of the section which displays missing entries to be synced

settings_listsync_progress_anime.description: List Sync label to display the user's latest watched episode for an anime on a specific provider

settings_listsync_progress_manga.description: List Sync label to display the user's latest read chapter for a mange on a specific provider

settings_listsync_repeatcount_anime.description: List Sync label to display the user's rewatch count for an anime on a specific provider

settings_listsync_repeatcount_manga.description: List Sync label to display the user's reread count for a manga on a specific provider

settings_listsync_score.description: List Sync label to display the user's score for an entry on a specific provider

settings_listsync_slave.description: List Sync label to show which provider is considered a mirror of the primary provider

settings_listsync_startdate.description: List Sync label to display the user's start date for an entry on a specific provider

settings_listsync_status.description: List Sync label to display the user's watch/read status for an entry on a specific provider

settings_listsync_syncinprogress.description: List Sync label to show that syncing is in progress

settings_listsync_unknowndate.description: List Sync message to show when a Start or Finish Date is not set for an entry

settings_listsync_updates.description: List Sync header of the section which displays updated entries to be synced

settings_listsync_volume.description: List Sync label to display the user's latest read volume for a manga on a specific provider

settings_loadPTWForProgress.description: In addition to CW/CR also load PTW/PTR when checking Progress

settings_malTags_Text.message: If enabled: The streaming page that you have used last is permanently (across browsers) saved in the tags/Notes section in your list. The saved string in the tag section is ugly, only really recommended if you dont use the tag/notes section.

settings_miniMAL_floatButtonCorrection.description: Remap floating button to the correction UI
settings_miniMAL_floatButtonCorrection.message: Remap floating button to the correction UI

settings_miniMAL_floatButtonStealth.description: Stealth UI mode. Lowers the visibility of some malSync UI elements

settings_miniMAL_floatButtonStealth_tool.description: Stealth UI mode tooltip. Lowers the visibility of some malSync UI elements
settings_miniMAL_floatButtonStealth_tool.message: Makes the progress indicator (at the bottom of your screen) transparent by default and makes it hide itself faster

settings_miniMAL_minimizeBigPopup.description: Shows an 'action required' popup hidding big popups

settings_miniMAL_minimizeBigPopup_toolti.description: Shows an 'action required' popup hidding big popups
settings_miniMAL_minimizeBigPopup_toolti.message: Minimizes big prompt boxes in MAL-Sync, which would cover most of the screen, behind a click.

settings_miniMAL_popup.description: Header of the settings section for the extension popup

settings_miniMAL_pwa.description: Link to the PWA version of the extension popup

settings_miniMAL_theme.description: Label for the theme switch dropdown (light/dark theme)

settings_miniMAL_window.description: Open miniMAL in separate window checkbox

settings_miscellaneous.description: Header of the section of settings without specific theme

settings_more_info.description: Link button which links to more informations

settings_onsite.description: Header of the section to change onsite website appearance and features

settings_permissions_overview.description: Button that leads to where permissions to sites can be managed

settings_permissions_pages.description: Header text for the list of page permissions

settings_permissions_player.description: Header text for the list of video player permissions

settings_permissions_required.description: Header text for the list of required permissions

settings_presenceShowButtons.description: Show button to view the anime/manga on MAL or another provider
settings_presenceShowButtons.message: Show button to view the anime/manga on MAL or another provider

settings_presenceShowMalsync.description: Show MAL-Sync in the title of the presence instead of anime/manga
settings_presenceShowMalsync.message: Show MAL-Sync in the title of the presence instead of anime/manga

settings_presence_largeimage.description: Dropdown label for selecting the presence image (manga/anime cover, website icon) for discord

settings_presence_largeimage_cover.description: Dropdown option to show the cover from mal on discord

settings_presence_largeimage_malsync.description: Dropdown option to show the malsync icon on discord

settings_presence_largeimage_website.description: Dropdown option to show the server icon on discord

settings_profile_check.description: Button to rechecks the login status

settings_profile_logged_via.description: Info about which provider is used to login

settings_progress.description: Header of the section of progress estimation settings

settings_progress_default.description: Dropdown option to use the default in the estimation for an anime/manga

settings_progress_disabled.description: Dropdown option to disable the estimation for an anime/manga

settings_progress_dropdown.description: Text over the dropdown to select the Episode estimation/prediction source

settings_read_less.description: Button to show less the description

settings_read_more.description: Button to show more of the description

settings_shortcut_tooltip.description: Shows this message if the users has only a single key set as shortcut
settings_shortcut_tooltip.message: It is not recommended to set the shortcut to a single key

settings_theming_background_image.description: Option to select a custom background image for the extension popup

settings_theming_background_opacity.description: Option to set the transparency of the UI in front of the background image

settings_theming_color.description: Option to select a custom theme color for the extension popup

settings_theming_sidebars.description: Option to disable the sidebars in the extension popup

settings_theming_theme_custom.description: Dropdown option to set the theme to custom witch shows a color picker

settings_theming_theme_dark.description: Dropdown option to set the theme to the dark theme

settings_theming_theme_light.description: Dropdown option to set the theme to the light theme

settings_theming_theme_system.description: Dropdown option to set the theme to the system (dark/light) theme

settings_tracking_disabled.description: Header for section with websites with disabled tracking

settings_website_button.description: Button that leads to the config page where individual pages can be disabled

syncPage_flashConfirm_offsetHandler_1.message: A possible episode offset of $calcOffset$ was detected. Is that correct?

syncPage_flash_player_error.message: Player not detected. Please manually update it here.

syncPage_malObj_nextEp_anime.description: Next episode message on streaming overview pages

syncPage_malObj_nextEp_manga.description: Next chapter message on streaming overview pages
